metadata.title: Alaska Seaweed Database: A Flora of the Benthic Marine Algae of Alaska, Phase I, an Inventory of Existing Collections (Type Specimen Data)

creators.name: University of British Columbia, Department of Botany, Herbarium

metadata.description: First comprehensive cataloguing of the marine benthic algae (seaweeds) occurring along Alaska coast. (By Sandra Lindstrom, UBC and Gayle Hansen, OSU)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide information on the type specimens of species of seaweeds reported to occur in Alaska.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Permission is granted to persons affiliated with academic and non-profit organizations to use University of British Columbia data obtained via the Internet for scientific and scholarly purposes only.
